price: Basi hatakuwa na nguvu wala msaidizi.
arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ
footnotes: Basi hapana mtu wakati huo ataye kuwa na nguvu ya kujikinga nafsi yake, wala hatakuwa na msaidizi wa kumnusuru.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famā lahu min quwwatin walā nāṣirin
